title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Securing Machine Learning Resources on AWS (TNC321)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 AWS 上保护机器学习资源 (TNC321)
abstract: Join us for an informative breakout session at focused on securing your machine learning workloads on AWS! Our experts will showcase best practices for protecting ML resources through comprehensive security controls. Learn how to implement IAM policies, configure secure network architectures, and build robust CI/CD pipelines for ML workflows. Through practical demonstrations and real-world examples, you’ll discover how to effectively safeguard sensitive ML workloads using AWS services. Perfect for data scientists, ML engineers, and security professionals looking to enhance their ML security expertise!
abstract_cn: 加入我们在AWS上专注于保护机器学习工作负载的信息分组会议！我们的专家将展示通过全面的安全控制来保护ML资源的最佳实践。了解如何实施IAM策略、配置安全的网络架构，以及为ML工作流构建强大的CI/CD管道。通过实际演示和真实案例，您将发现如何使用AWS服务有效保护敏感的ML工作负载。非常适合希望提升ML安全专业知识的数据科学家、ML工程师和安全专业人员！
